remarks: Commutation property of Baer's sigma map (Holland's A map).  Line 20 of [Holland95] p. 14.  Also part of Lemma 1 of [Baer] p. 110 line 7. (Contributed by NM, 9-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hdmapip0com.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmapip0com.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapip0com.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmapip0com.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hdmapip0com.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
hdmapip0com.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapip0com.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmapip0com.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
hdmapip0com.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
hdmapip0com $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ( S ` X ) ` Y ) = .0. <-> ( ( S ` Y ) ` X ) = .0. ) ) $.
